statements: SELECT * FROM practice_plans;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_name LIKE 'Intermediate%';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM practice_plans ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT plan_name, created_at FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM practice_plans WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM practice_plans WHERE plan_description LIKE '%advanced%';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM practice_plans ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM practice_plans;
SELECT * FROM practice_sessions;
SELECT session_date, coach_name FROM practice_sessions WHERE duration_hours > 2;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description FROM practice_goals ORDER BY goal_id DESC;
SELECT session_id, duration_hours FROM practice_sessions WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM practice_sessions JOIN practice_goals ON practice_sessions.session_id = practice_goals.session_id;
SELECT session_id, session_date, duration_hours, coach_name FROM practice_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM practice_sessions WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM practice_sessions GROUP BY coach_name;
SELECT practice_sessions.session_id, session_date, goal_description FROM practice_sessions JOIN practice_goals ON practice_sessions.session_id = practice_goals.session_id;
SELECT session_id, goal_description FROM practice_sessions LEFT JOIN practice_goals ON practice_sessions.session_id = practice_goals.session_id;
SELECT * FROM practice_session_plans;
SELECT session_id, date, duration_hours FROM practice_session_plans WHERE duration_hours > 2;
SELECT drill_name, focus_area FROM drills WHERE difficulty_level = 3 ORDER BY drill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE player_id = 123 AND completed = FALSE;
SELECT goal_description, target_date FROM goals WHERE target_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM practice_session_plans ORDER BY session_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT session_id, duration_hours, location FROM practice_session_plans WHERE coach_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT focus_area FROM drills ORDER BY focus_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM practice_session_plans INNER JOIN drills ON practice_session_plans.session_id = drills.drill_id WHERE practice_session_plans.date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, goal_description, completed FROM goals WHERE completed = TRUE AND target_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM practice_sessions;
SELECT session_id, date FROM practice_sessions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, description FROM drills ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT goal_id, player_id, description FROM goals WHERE player_id = '98765432-1234-5678-90ab-cdef09876543' AND description LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT player_id, total_goals, total_assists, total_matches FROM player_stats WHERE total_goals > 10 AND total_matches < 20;
SELECT * FROM practice_sessions ORDER BY date DESC, session_id
SELECT name, duration FROM drills WHERE duration > 30
SELECT player_id, description FROM goals WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE total_goals > 10 ORDER BY total_goals DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_goals) AS total_goals FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_goals DESC
SELECT * FROM players
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward'
SELECT drill_name, drill_description FROM drills ORDER BY drill_name DESC
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_notes FROM practice_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT p.player_name, d.drill_name, ps.session_date FROM players p JOIN player_progress pp ON p.player_id = pp.player_id JOIN drills d ON pp.drill_id = d.drill_id JOIN practice_sessions ps ON pp.session_id = ps.session_id
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Striker';
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Midfielder' ORDER BY player_name DESC;

SELECT player_name, drill_name FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN drills ON player_progress.drill_id = drills.drill_id WHERE goals.goal_achieved = true;
SELECT session_date, session_notes FROM practice_sessions WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1);

SELECT player_name, drill_description FROM players p JOIN player_progress pp ON p.player_id = pp.player_id JOIN drills d ON pp.drill_id = d.drill_id WHERE p.player_position = 'Defender' AND pp.session_id = 3 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
